name: Desmond Elliott
content: Desmond Elliott at the University of Copenhagen Associate Professor University of Copenhagen Department of Computer Science Vibenshuset, 4th Floor, Lyngbyvej 2 KÃ¸benhavn 2100 de@di.ku.dk (FAQ) 11/25: I will be a Program Chair for EMNLP 2026. 11/25: One paper accepted to WACV. Congratulations Danae! 11/25: One paper accepted at the EurIPS Workshop on The Science of Benchmarking and Evaluating AI. Congratulations Ruchira! 11/25: Talking about Language Modelling from Pixels at IVADO Regroupement 3 and the Mila Tea Talks Series 10/25: Talking about Efficient Test-time Scaling for Small Vision-Language Models at Mila and the University of Waterloo 10/25: I will be visiting the Mila until mid-November. 10/25: One paper accepted to IJCNLP-AACL. Congratulations Ram! 08/25: One paper accepted to EMNLP. Congratulations Ilker! 08/25: Recruiting a postdoc to join the Danish Foundation Models project to work on post-training methods for low-resource languages. Applications due by 15 August. 08/25: Talking about Retrieval-augmented Image Captioning at the MAGMAR Workshop at ACL. 07/25: One paper accepted in TACL. Congratulations Ingo! 07/25: Lecturing on Vision-Language Models at ACVSS and LXMLS. 07/25: One paper accepted at COLM. Congratulations Laura! 07/25: Talking about Pixel Language Models at the Tokenization Workshop at ICML. 06/25: Best Paper Honorable Award at the CVPR Visual Concepts Workshop! 06/25: Talking about Multilingual Vision-Language Research at the VLMs-4-All Workshop at CVPR. 05/25: I will be visiting the Helsinki Institute for Social Sciences and Humanities until June. 05/25: Four papers accepted at ACL 2025. Congratulations Anna, Nadav, Dan, and Constanza! 04/25: Recruiting a postdoc to join the Responsible AI for the People Project. Applications due by 1 May. 03/25: I will be an Associate Editor for JAIR from 2025--2028. 02/25: I am a Senior Area Chair for ACL 2025. 02/25: One paper in AI. Congratulations Alice! 01/25: Organized Workshop of Evaluation of Multi-Modal Generation
